summary: Interact with Gong API to retrieve call data and user information.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the authentication method to use (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the type of resource to interact with (Call, User, or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Get, Get Many).

parameters.name: call
parameters.description: Specify the Gong call to retrieve data for, either by ID or URL.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for retrieving call data, such as specific properties to include.
